main event: In June/July 1952, multiple witnesses in Spencer, Indiana, reported observations of an unidentified object emitting a whirring sound.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as being approximately 100 feet in diameter and oblong in shape., The object had a row of lights along its outer edge., It was observed moving silently about 100 feet off the ground., The sighting lasted 8-10 minutes before the object moved away rapidly., The investigation concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Individuals including a retired couple and concerned citizens in the area.
